channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Columbia University Considers Deploying Peace Officers With Arrest Powers for Future Pro-Hamas Protests
Dem superdelegates celebrate Harris picking Walz for running mate: 'Couldn't be happier'
item.description: Democratic superdelegates, also known as automatic delegates, celebrated Vice President Harris choosing Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz as her 2024 running mate.

item.title: Trump Agrees to 'Major' Interview With Elon Musk
item.description: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said Tuesday he will do "a major interview with Elon Musk" on the night of Monday, Aug. 12.

item.title: JD Vance Response to Walz Pick Shows Just How It Should Be Done
Harris leaning into 'pro-Hamas,' 'progressive' wings of Democrat Party with Walz VP pick: GOP strategist
item.description: Kamala Harris' surprise pick of Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz, is evidence she's leaning heavily into the 'pro-Hamas' progressive wing of the Democratic Party says one GOP strategist.

item.title: Trump Believed to Have Been Target of Foiled Assassination Plot
item.description: A Pakistani man alleged to have ties to Iran has been charged in a plot to carry out political assassinations on U.S. soil, the Justice Department said Tuesday.Prosecutors in Brooklyn announced criminal charges against Asif Merchant, accusing him of traveling to New York to...

item.title: JD Vance Levels a Reporter Freaking Out Over His 'Cat Lady' Comments
Harris' running mate faces renewed scrutiny after his 'weird' socialism comparison resurfaces
item.description: Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz. a Democrat, is facing renewed criticism over a quote seemingly defending socialism now that he has been selected as VP Harris' running mate.

item.title: Election First Since 1976 Sans a Bush, Clinton or Biden
item.description: The 2024 presidential race will be the first in almost half a century to not feature a Bush, Clinton or Biden on the Republican or Democratic tickets, Axios noted on Tuesday.

item.title: 'The Darker Part of the Party': CNN's Van Jones Goes There, Says Walz Pick Is for 'Anti-Jewish Bigots'
New York county passes face mask ban
item.description: New York's Nassau County voted to pass a bill criminalizing the use of face masks to protect one's identity at a hearing where one protester was arrested.

item.title: CCGA Poll: Majority Says No to US Troops in Israel
item.description: A majority of Americans oppose sending U.S. troops to defend Israel if it is attacked by its neighbors, according to a new poll from the Chicago Council on Global Affairs.

item.title: Opinion: Walz Sidelining Shapiro Shows the Antisemites Have Won
Former Minnesota GOP governor sums up Tim Walz VP pick: 'Bernie Sanders in hunting gear'
item.description: Former Minnesota Republican Gov. Tim Pawlenty weighed in on Vice President Kamala Harris' selection of Gov. Tim Walz as her running mate, calling him "Bernie Sanders in hunting gear."

item.title: Schumer Sees Chance to Pass AI Bills Before Election
item.description: With the window for legislative action quickly closing this calendar year and control of the Senate up for grabs, Majority Leader Chuck Schumer, D-N.Y., is looking to get bills through Congress on regulating artificial intelligence, NBC News reported Monday.
